report.name: 登录
report.sql: select t.id, t.username from GV_SYS_ACCOUNT t, gv_sys_domain d where t.domain_id = d.id and t.status_id = 3 and t.loginName = ? and t.password = ? and d.code = ?

report.name: 仓库列表（所有）
report.sql: select w.id as id, w.descr as name from gv_bas_warehouse w where w.status_id = 3
select w.id as id, w.descr as name from gv_bas_warehouse w, GV_SYS_USEROFWH wu where w.status_id = 3 and w.id = wu.warehouse_id and wu.user_id = ?
